叅字的基本解释

叅
cān
古同“参”。

叅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shēn］
［《廣韻》所今切，平侵，生。］
亦作“叄1”。“参1”的繁体字。“薓1”的今字。
(1)星名，二十八宿之一。
(2)中药名。
(3)通常指人参。
(4)见“參參”。
[②]［cēn］
［《廣韻》楚簪切，平侵，初。］
亦作“叄2”。“参2”的繁体字。
见“參2差”。
[③]［cān］
［《廣韻》倉含切，平覃，清。］
亦作“叄3”。亦作“叅1”。“参3”的繁体字。
(1)罗列；并立。
(2)参与；参加。
(3)旧时下级按一定的礼节晋见上级。
(4)犹问候。
(5)检验；考索验证。
(6)领悟；琢磨。
(7)弹劾。
(8)选拔；委派。
(9)高。参见“參3寥”。
(10)间杂；杂乱。
(11)古时重量单位。
(12)通“驂”。陪乘或陪乘的人。
[④]［sān］
［《廣韻》蘇甘切，平談，心。］
亦作“叄4”。“参4”的繁体字。通“三1”。
[⑤]［càn］
［《廣韻》七紺切，去勘，清。］
亦

叅字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【厶字部】　叅； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页164第31
【正韻】倉含切，音驂。【廣韻】參俗作叅。

叅字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
叅字的起名意思

暂无。

叅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shēn]
["Guangyun" is cut today, flat invaded, and born. ]
Also known as "Three 1". Traditional characters for "参1". The present character for "薓1".
(1) Star name, one of twenty-eight nights.
(2) The name of the Chinese medicine.
(3) Usually refers to ginseng.
(4) See "Participation".
[②]［cēn］
["Guangyun" Chu hairpin cut, flat invasion, early. ]
Also known as "Three 2". Traditional characters for "参2".
See "Part 2 difference".
[③]［cān］
["Guangyun" Cang Hanqie, Pingtan, Qing. ]
Also known as "Three 3". Also known as "叅1". Traditional characters for "参3".
(1) List; stand side by side.
(2) Participate; participate.
(3) In the old days, subordinates were promoted to superiors according to certain etiquette.
(4) Still greetings.
(5) Inspection; test and verify.
(6) Comprehend; ponder.
(7) Impeachment.
(8) Selection; appointment.
(9) High. See "Reference 3 Liao".
(10) Interspersed; messy.
(11) Ancient weight unit.
(12) Through "骖". The person who accompanies or accompanies the passenger.
[④]［sān］
["Guangyun" Su Ganqie, flat talk, heart. ]
Also known as "Three 4". Traditional characters for "参4". Linked to "Three 1".
[⑤]［càn］
["Guangyun" seven cuts, go to survey, clear. ]
also
